languages.text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer didn't spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their turn, they double their cover efficiency until the end of the wearer's next turn and gain immunity to the forced movement effects.

If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.

If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.

languages.text: 如果装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中没有使用任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，则装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}加倍，且免疫一切强制位移效果，效果持续至装备者下个回合结束为止。
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者在回合中没有使用任何{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，则装备者的掩体效果加倍，且免疫一切强制位移效果，直到装备者下个回合结束为止。

languages.text: Если персонаж в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} не тратит {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, то до конца его следующего хода для него удваивается {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективность укрытий{/g}, а также он получает иммунитет к эффектам насильственного перемещения.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Если персонаж в свой ход не тратит {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, эффективность укрытий для него удваивается до конца следующего хода. Также он получает иммунитет к эффектам насильственного перемещения.

Если персонаж в свой ход не тратит {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, эффективность укрытий для него удваивается до конца следующего хода. Также он получает иммунитет к эффектам насильственного перемещения.

languages.text: 使用者が自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を使用しなかった場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物効率{/g}が2倍になり、次のターン終了まで強制移動効果への耐性を獲得する。
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 自身のターンで{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を使用しない場合、次のターン終了までカバー効果が倍増し、強制移動効果が無効になる。

languages.text: Si el portador no gasta {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, duplica su {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} y gana inmunidad a los efectos de movimiento forzado hasta el final de su próximo turno.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador no gasta {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} durante su turno, duplica su eficacia de cobertura hasta el final de su próximo turno y gana inmunidad a los efectos de movimiento forzado.

languages.text: Hat der Träger während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbraucht, verdoppelt sich seine {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g} und er erhält bis zum Ende des nächsten Zuges des Trägers Immunität gegen erzwungene Bewegungseffekte.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Hat der Träger während seines Zuges keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} verbraucht, verdoppelt sich seine Deckungseffizienz bis zum Ende des nächsten Zuges des Trägers und er erhält Immunität gegen erzwungene Bewegungseffekte.

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur n'a pas utilisé ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de sa couverture{/g} est doublée et il est invulnérable aux effets des déplacements forcés jusqu'à la fin de son prochain suivant.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur n'a pas utilisé ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pendant son tour, l'efficacité de sa couverture est doublée jusqu'à la fin de son tour suivant et il est invulnérable aux effets des déplacements forcés.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'sini{/g} harcamamışsa {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper etkililiği{/g} iki katına çıkar ve zorunlu hareket etkilerine karşı bağışıklık kazanır. Bu etkiler, giyen kişinin bir sonraki turunun sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'sini{/g} harcamamışsa {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper etkililiği{/g} iki katına çıkar ve zorunlu hareket etkilerine karşı bağışıklık kazanır. Bu etkiler, giyen kişinin bir sonraki turunun sonuna dek sürer.
